transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Good morning sir.
Executive: Vishal baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se toh kaise hain?
Customer: Vishal ji main on the way hu, gaadi chala raha hu. Abhi aadha ghanta lagega mujhe pahunchne mein. Main aapko call back karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir, please mujhe inform karega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is driving and will call back in half an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to inform him when he is available.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call back, availability
